attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you may know, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland are all devolved, but not England. The government keeps this quiet, but why is England not devolved? Is England somehow less important than other coutries in our union?

Please sign this petition to show your support for a devolved England.

Internationally we can be seen as one, together in our union. To us we can function a lot better with devolved governments.


Thank you.

rejection.details: Please provide both your first and surname when submitting a petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
